Web Application Developer

  CryptoLogic, Inc. is an Internet software development and licensing company with proprietary commerce-enabling technology that permits secure, reliable, efficient and rapid financial transactions over the Internet.

Our products permit the processing of online transactions, with a current focus on e-commerce software. Our software is used by individuals registered in 240 nations and territories worldwide. We have processed more than 380 million individual transactions and in excess of US$ 4 billion in secure electronic deposits, from more than 580,000 clients. Common shares of the Company are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange and on the Nasdaq National Market.

Located at the Yonge/Davisville subway area of Toronto, we are currently looking to expand our team with a

Web Application Developer

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain core back-end technologies, primarily mod_perl development
As part of development group, you will work closely with the development team and the templating/HTML programming group. This is newly created position.

Required Skills:

- 3+ years experience
- mod_perl expertise
- HTML & JavaScript
- Apache Web Server (configuration and tuning)
- strong Unix background (BSD preferred)
- OO Perl experience
- RDBMS experience (MySQL and SQL)

Knowledge of C would be an asset.


If you would like to be considered for this role, please forward your resume to jobs@cryptologic.com, quoting your name and the position you are applying for in the subject line of the email.

Interviews will begin immediately, however due to the volume of replies, we are sorry, but only those chosen for an interview will be contacted.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
